title: Saudi Arabia’s leadership upheaval | Brookings
snippet: Bruce Riedel assesses the unusual but not unexpected shakeup in the House of Saud where King Salman replaced Crown Prince and Minister of the Interior Mohammad bin Nayef with his 31-year-old son Defense Minister Mohammad bin Salman.
